titleStmt.title: A vindication of the new theory of the earth from the exceptions of Mr. Keill and others with an historical preface of the occasions of the discoveries therein contain'd, and some corrections and additions.
titleStmt.author: Whiston, William, 1667-1752.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Whiston by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
